Class
Description
Bishop
Bishop subclass that extends from the abstract Piece class.
Check
Contains the logic associated with legalising possible moves on the board.
ChessGame
The instance of the chess game.
Game
The instance of the tic-tac-toe game.
GameStatus
Checks if a given game has been won / tied.

King subclass that extends from the abstract Piece class.
Knight
Knight subclass that extends from the abstract Piece class.
Main
The main menu.

Pawn subclass that extends from the abstract Piece class.

Abstract class for a piece on a chess board.

Queen subclass that extends from the abstract Piece class.

Rook subclass that extends from the abstract Piece class.
Space
A space on the tic-tac-toe game board.
Tile
A tile on the chess board.
WinLine
A line of spaces on the game board.
